channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024072081
item.description:
Report X-2024072081

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-23
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA ONE GROUND TO ALASKA PACKAGE FROM CALIFORNIA WAS INSPECTED DUE TO SECURITY HEARING A RATTLE AEROSOL SOUND COMING FROM THE BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SEVEN INNER BOXES WITH FLAMMABLE GAS 2.1 PICTOGRAMS AND UN2037. EACH OF THESE SEVEN INNER BOXES CONTAIN TWELVE X 10.14 OUNCE CANS OF NEON QUINTUPLE REFINED PREMIUM BUTANE LIGHTER REFILLS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. PRIOR TO THE UNDECLARED DISCOVERY THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN ON ONE UPS FLIGHT FROM ONT TO ANC.

item.title: Report X-2024071975
item.description:
Report X-2024071975

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-29
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE FROM THE USA TO HONG KONG WAS INSPECTED AT THE UPS ANCHORAGE, ALASKA FACILITY PRIOR TO EXPORT. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 106 IPHONES CONTAINING LITHIUM ION BATTERIES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. INVOICE DESCRIPTION IS IPHONE 7, 7 PLUS. THERMAL LABEL DESCRIPTION IS MOBILE PHONE. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM ILLINOIS, USA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 78Y031, ZINGKAAI TELECOM LIMITED, RM B51, 12-F, MAI GAR IND BLDG, KWUN TONG, HONG KONG SAR CHINA.

item.title: Report X-2024071824
item.description:
Report X-2024071824

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-25T15:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-19
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA, ONE GROUND TO ALASKA PACKAGE REQUIRED A REWRAP DUE TO BEING WET FROM RAINWATER. GROUND TO ALASKA IS A LOWER RATE OFFERED BUT THE PACKAGE MUST TRANSPORT IN THE AIR NETWORK. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE INNER BOX MARKED CARTRIDGES, SMALL ARMS, UN0012, 1.4S WITH A GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARK. THIS BOX CONTAINS (25) INNER BOXES CONTAINING (20) FRONTIER 62 GR FULL METAL JACKET CARTRIDGES. THIS PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS (7) 50 ROUND BOXES OF WINCHESTER 9MM 124 GRAIN FULL METAL JACKET CARTRIDGES AND (3) 550 ROUND BOXES OF RIMFIRE TARGET CARTRIDGES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024071536
item.description:
Report X-2024071536

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-25T15:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-22
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airlines
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X RAY OF SHIPMENT SHOWED OUTLINE THAT LOOKED UNCLEAR. BROUGHT TO SMALLER X RAY TO GET A BETTER PICTURE. SAW AN OUTLINE THAT APPEARED TO BE A TOOL AND POSSIBLY BATTERIES. PERFORMED PHYSICAL SEARCH AND CONFIRMED THERE WERE TWO LOOSE LITHIUM ION BATTERIES IN ONE PIECE OF THE SHIPMENT. 36 Wh and 92.5 Wh
